casebody.data:
Friday, January 7, 2000

MOTION DOCKET

99-2211. Tidenberg v. Jones.

Stark App. No. 1999CA00115. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal and claimed appeal of right. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay of the court of appeals’ judgment,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for stay of the court of appeals’ judgment be, and hereby is, denied.
